body.value:
This is the first article of "Get Inspiration" initiative. Before we proceed further, Wisdom always believe that every aspirants is unique in thinking, unique in his capabilities, very unique to response to his environment. With this basic belief, we may find stories, videos, blogs we share here irrelevant to you, that's perfectly fine.

Our goal is that, to teach to create capability to observe, think out of the box. Hence we encourage every aspirants try to find constant energy and zeal from their own surroundings may be its their family members, may its academic figure, may be its global personality, may be common person you know him/her best, may be its nature etc. 

With this basis assumption Wisdom would like to share quote which is very basic foundation principle of UPSC aspirants. 

 

Great Minds Discuss Ideas,

Average Minds Discuss Events,

Average Minds Discuss People.

 

Always keep this quote in mind whenever you discuss or study or observe or think. Based on above quote you get importance of ideas, and your goal is - how to capture it from discussion, study, observations, critical thinking and analysis. Whenever you study try to find idea behind what you read, observe, listen and it is easy to to get connected with events and people.

 

When you discuss with among your friends/colleague, certainly we need to discuss about events and people but it should be associated with some ideas. It will make you get concept easily. 

 

So take away of the quote is simple.

1. Discuss ideas about your study- news you are reading, article you are analysing, surrounding you are observing etc-.

2. Try not to focus on events but some events are connected to ideas those are important for example event of 1857 is driven by ideas of independence or various events before that. Hence we need to connect ideas around events.

3. Does - Try to discuss people those who are in news with great achievement and in connection with ideas. Do not waste your time and energy discussing about your uncomfortable friends, relatives, people around you. So that you will learn to avoid and ignore people with negative minds and people who are interested in what you do to look you down.

 

I hope this will give you guide to face your day to day problems, issues and at the same time give you approach to study, observe, think, analyse. Best Luck.
